title: League crashing and getting a ban
body: Okay just queued for a game and waiting for the top laner to pick his champ and the timer went to 0 so i was like 'Great i have to wait again' but then the client shut down and now i have a 5 min ban cause of it crashing i understand i got the 5 min delay before because i mistimed picking champs but when i didn't do anything and still getting the timer ban...its annoying . thought i would let you guys know cause there have been issues with the client recently

replies.body: It sounds like your network failed to transition from champion select to the loading screen, and instead went into a dormant state.  We can't remove a resulting [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ), but I'd like to help prevent further ones.  You should go through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and test it in a custom game to prevent penalties.  #questons
